languages.text: "Сначала — была Эпитафия. Это мир, но он лишь футляр, контейнер, для чего-то, что мы не можем назвать и не можем понять. Теодора и этот корабль бывали там. Из мира наверх было поднято нечто. Дар. Доверенный жрец в алом — тот, кто обозначал себя как "Амарнат" — постигал дар, поднятый с Эпитафии. И из него создал то, что в банках информации значится как "техночума".

"First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"
languages.original_text: "Сначала — была Эпитафия. Это мир, но он лишь футляр, контейнер, для чего-то, что мы не можем назвать и не можем понять. Теодора и этот корабль бывали там. Из мира наверх было поднято нечто. Дар. Доверенный жрец в алом — тот, кто обозначал себя как "Амарнат" — постигал дар, поднятый с Эпитафии. И из него создал то, что в банках информации значится как "техночума".

languages.text: «Primero estuvo Epitafio. Es un mundo, pero era solo una funda, un contenedor de algo que no podemos nombrar ni entender. Theodora y su nave estuvieron en ese lugar. Sacaron algo de ese mundo. Un regalo. Un sacerdote de confianza, vestido de carmesí, que se hacía llamar "Amarnat", comprendió el regalo extraído de Epitafio. A partir de él, creó algo que los bancos de datos denominan "tecnoplaga"».
languages.original_text: "First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"

traits.locale_text: «Primero estuvo Epitafio. Es un mundo, pero era solo una funda, un contenedor de algo que no podemos nombrar ni entender. Theodora y su nave estuvieron en ese lugar. Sacaron algo de ese mundo. Un regalo. Un sacerdote de confianza, vestido de carmesí, que se hacía llamar "Amarnat", comprendió el regalo extraído de Epitafio. A partir de él, creó algo que los bancos de datos denominan "tecnoplaga"».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「はじめにエピタフがあった。それは、我々が名づけることも理解することもできない世界だが、何かのための外殻か容器にすぎない。シオドーラとこの船は、その場所を訪れたことがある。その世界から何かが引き上げられた。贈り物だ。深紅の服に身を包んだ信頼できる司祭…『アマルナト』と名乗る人物は、エピタフから引き上げられた贈り物が何かを理解した。そこから彼は、データ格納機が『テック・ブライト』と記録しているものを生み出した」
languages.original_text: "First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"

traits.locale_text: 「はじめにエピタフがあった。それは、我々が名づけることも理解することもできない世界だが、何かのための外殻か容器にすぎない。シオドーラとこの船は、その場所を訪れたことがある。その世界から何かが引き上げられた。贈り物だ。深紅の服に身を包んだ信頼できる司祭…『アマルナト』と名乗る人物は、エピタフから引き上げられた贈り物が何かを理解した。そこから彼は、データ格納機が『テック・ブライト』と記録しているものを生み出した」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “首先是荒垄碑碣。它是一个世界，但它只是一个外壳，一个容器，它是我们无法命名、也无法理解的东西。西奥多拉和这艘船去过那个地方，有什么东西从那个世界上升了起来，那是一件礼物。一位深受信赖的红衣牧师，自称为‘阿玛纳特’，理解了荒垄碑碣赠与的礼物。在此基础上，他创造出了数据库中所提及的‘技术枯萎症’。”
languages.original_text: "First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"

traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Au commencement, il y avait Épitaphe. C'est un monde, mais en même temps, ce n'est qu'un simple réceptacle pour quelque chose que nous ne pouvons ni nommer ni comprendre. Théodora et son vaisseau s'y sont rendus. Une chose a été prélevée sur ce monde. Un présent. Un prêtre fidèle vêtu de rouge, qui se faisait appeler Amarnat, a compris le don originaire d'Épitaphe et en a tiré ce que les banques de données désignent sous le nom de "technopeste". »
languages.original_text: "First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"

traits.locale_text: « Au commencement, il y avait Épitaphe. C'est un monde, mais en même temps, ce n'est qu'un simple réceptacle pour quelque chose que nous ne pouvons ni nommer ni comprendre. Théodora et son vaisseau s'y sont rendus. Une chose a été prélevée sur ce monde. Un présent. Un prêtre fidèle vêtu de rouge, qui se faisait appeler Amarnat, a compris le don originaire d'Épitaphe et en a tiré ce que les banques de données désignent sous le nom de "technopeste". »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Zuerst gab es Epitaph. Es ist eine Welt, doch es ist lediglich eine Vitrine, ein Behälter für etwas, was wir nicht benennen und nicht verstehen können. Theodora und dieses Schiff waren dort. Etwas wurde von der Welt hochgeholt. Ein Geschenk. Ein vertrauenswürdiger Priester in Rot — einer, der sich als 'Amarnat' identifizierte — verstand das Geschenk, das von Epitaph hochgeholt wurde. Und er erschuf daraus, was die Datenbanken als 'Tech-Seuche' aufführen."
languages.original_text: "First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"

traits.locale_text: "Zuerst gab es Epitaph. Es ist eine Welt, doch es ist lediglich eine Vitrine, ein Behälter für etwas, was wir nicht benennen und nicht verstehen können. Theodora und dieses Schiff waren dort. Etwas wurde von der Welt hochgeholt. Ein Geschenk. Ein vertrauenswürdiger Priester in Rot — einer, der sich als 'Amarnat' identifizierte — verstand das Geschenk, das von Epitaph hochgeholt wurde. Und er erschuf daraus, was die Datenbanken als 'Tech-Seuche' aufführen."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Başta Kitabe vardı. Bir dünyaydı; adını bilmediğimiz, kavrayamadığımız bir şeyi içinde barındıran bir nevi kutu yahut kap. Theodora, bu gemiyle birlikte oraya gitti. Dünyadan bir şey çıkarıldı. Bir armağan. 'Amarnat' adlı, kızıllar içindeki bir rahip, Sinyazıt'tan yücelen armağanı kavradı. Bu armağandan veri bankalarında 'tekno afeti' olarak geçen şeyi meydana getirdi."
languages.original_text: "First, there was Epitaph. It is a world, but it is merely a case, a container, for something we cannot name and cannot understand. Theodora and this ship have been to that place. Something was lifted up from the world. A gift. A trusted priest in crimson — one who identified himself as 'Amarnat' — comprehended the gift raised from Epitaph. And from it, he created what the data-banks list as a 'tech-blight.'"

traits.locale_text: "Başta Kitabe vardı. Bir dünyaydı; adını bilmediğimiz, kavrayamadığımız bir şeyi içinde barındıran bir nevi kutu yahut kap. Theodora, bu gemiyle birlikte oraya gitti. Dünyadan bir şey çıkarıldı. Bir armağan. 'Amarnat' adlı, kızıllar içinde bir rahip, Kitabe'den yücelen armağanı kavradı. Ve bu armağandan veri bankalarında 'tekno afeti' olarak geçen şeyi meydana getirdi."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
